title: Ann Johnston
text:
I’m currently a PhD student in the department of statistics at Penn State University, advised by Dr. Aleksandra Slavković.
My research interests lie in algebraic statisics and official statistics, with a special focus on understanding and predicting population estimates under missing/incomplete data.
Prior to joining Penn State, I got my Masters’ degree in Mathematics from the University of Southern California, and did my undergrad in Mathematics at Harvey Mudd College.
